title: Maharani Kundan Haaram with Ruby and Emerald Accents
features: Elaborate Kundan setting showcases the brilliance of Polki diamonds. Features peacock (Mayura) motifs flanking a central Ruby, with Emerald accents for vibrant contrast. The design is inspired by Mughal aesthetics, reimagined in a classic Hyderabadi style. Delicately strung pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Muhurtham and Sangeet. A statement piece for special occasions
adding regal charm to any outfit.
description: A timeless masterpiece blending traditional Mughal Kundan craftsmanship with classic South Indian design sensibilities. The high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant gemstones create a captivating sparkle. Handcrafted with meticulous detail by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional quality and enduring beauty. This Haaram is a valuable heirloom, representing both cultural heritage and exquisite artistry.
